text: vAqyaqvya(gg)# SvEqtamA la#BEtaq BUti#kAmO  vAqyurvai kShEpi#ShThA dEqvatA#vAqyumEqva svEna# BAgaqdhEyEqnOpa# dhAvatiq sa EqvainaqM BUti#M gamayatiqBava#tyEqvA-ti#kShiprA dEqvatEtyA#huqH saina#mISvaqrA praqdahaq ityEqtamEqva santa#M ~MvAqyavE# niqyutva#taq A la#BEta niqyudvA a#syaq dhRuti#rddhRuqta Eqva BUtiqmupaiqtya pra#dAhAyaq Bava#tyEqva - [  ]   1
